name: Water Carrier
description:
Help the little girl collect the water and give it to the children.

Attention to the enemies, if you touch them you will loose the water and a I life.

When you give water to all the kids a new level will start.

Use the arrows to play.

Design, graphics and development  Mauro Rilla - https://misterm.itch.io

Music: https://www.bensound.com
